features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User login and authentication with role-based access (admin, charge_nurse, staff_nurse) using Supabase

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Main administrative interface with system overview, statistics, and navigation tabs

features.name: Nurse Management
features.description: Complete CRUD operations for nurse profiles including personal info, qualifications, ward access, and years of experience

features.name: Ward Management
features.description: Management of hospital wards with shift requirements, hierarchy levels, and nurse assignments

features.name: Schedule Generator
features.description: Algorithm-based shift scheduling system for generating optimal nurse schedules

features.name: Schedule Viewer
features.description: Interface for viewing and managing generated schedules

features.name: Nurse Dashboard
features.description: Staff-level interface for nurses to view their schedules and personal information

features.name: API Service Layer
features.description: Centralized API communication service for all backend operations including nurses, wards, and schedules

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive set of reusable UI components built on Radix UI primitives

features.name: Navigation and Layout
features.description: Tab-based navigation system and responsive layout components

features.name: Form Components
features.description: Form validation and input handling components

features.name: Testing Component
features.description: Debug component for testing Add Nurse functionality and API connectivity

features.name: Styling System
features.description: Global styles, utility functions, and Tailwind CSS configuration

features.name: Application Entry Point
features.description: Main application component with routing and state management
